mapper.select:
select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.created_by_person , t1.created_by_dept , t1.created_by_tel , t1.form_state , t1.proc_name , t1.proc_id , t1.asset_id , t1.unified_id , t1.device_category , t1.device_name , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_dept , t1.user_id , t1.user_dept , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.created_date , t1.position_id , t1.original_value , t1.total_depreciation , t1.net_value , t1.net_salvage , t1.secret_level , t1.scrap_reason , t1.product_risk_analyse , t1.scrap_money , t1.recovery_store , t1.device_id from assets_device_scrap t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_PERSON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByPerson}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByDept}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_TEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByTel}),'%')
and t1.FORM_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.formState}),'%')
and t1.PROC_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.procName}),'%')
and t1.PROC_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.procId}),'%')
and t1.ASSET_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.assetId}),'%')
and t1.UNIFIED_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifiedId}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_CATEGORY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceCategory}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_MODEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceModel}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_SPEC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceSpec}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerId}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerDept}),'%')
and t1.USER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.userId}),'%')
and t1.USER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.userDept}),'%')
and t1.MANUFACTURER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturerId}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_DATE >= #{bean.createdDateBegin}
and t1.CREATED_DATE <= #{bean.createdDateEnd}
and t1.POSITION_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.positionId}),'%')
and t1.ORIGINAL_VALUE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.originalValue}),'%')
and t1.TOTAL_DEPRECIATION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.totalDepreciation}),'%')
and t1.NET_VALUE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.netValue}),'%')
and t1.NET_SALVAGE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.netSalvage}),'%')
and t1.SECRET_LEVEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.secretLevel}),'%')
and t1.SCRAP_REASON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.scrapReason}),'%')
and t1.PRODUCT_RISK_ANALYSE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.productRiskAnalyse}),'%')
and t1.SCRAP_MONEY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.scrapMoney}),'%')
and t1.RECOVERY_STORE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.recoveryStore}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceId}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.created_by_person , t1.created_by_dept , t1.created_by_tel , t1.form_state , t1.proc_name , t1.proc_id , t1.asset_id , t1.unified_id , t1.device_category , t1.device_name , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_dept , t1.user_id , t1.user_dept , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.created_date , t1.position_id , t1.original_value , t1.total_depreciation , t1.net_value , t1.net_salvage , t1.secret_level , t1.scrap_reason , t1.product_risk_analyse , t1.scrap_money , t1.recovery_store , t1.device_id from assets_device_scrap t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
or t1.ID =#{bean.id}
or t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
or t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
or t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
or t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
or t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
or t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
or t1.CREATED_BY_PERSON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByPerson}),'%')
or t1.CREATED_BY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByDept}),'%')
or t1.CREATED_BY_TEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByTel}),'%')
or t1.FORM_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.formState}),'%')
or t1.PROC_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.procName}),'%')
or t1.PROC_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.procId}),'%')
or t1.ASSET_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.assetId}),'%')
or t1.UNIFIED_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifiedId}),'%')
or t1.DEVICE_CATEGORY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceCategory}),'%')
or t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')
or t1.DEVICE_MODEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceModel}),'%')
or t1.DEVICE_SPEC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceSpec}),'%')
or t1.OWNER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerId}),'%')
or t1.OWNER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerDept}),'%')
or t1.USER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.userId}),'%')
or t1.USER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.userDept}),'%')
or t1.MANUFACTURER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturerId}),'%')
or t1.CREATED_DATE >= #{bean.createdDateBegin}
or t1.CREATED_DATE <= #{bean.createdDateEnd}
or t1.POSITION_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.positionId}),'%')
or t1.ORIGINAL_VALUE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.originalValue}),'%')
or t1.TOTAL_DEPRECIATION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.totalDepreciation}),'%')
or t1.NET_VALUE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.netValue}),'%')
or t1.NET_SALVAGE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.netSalvage}),'%')
or t1.SECRET_LEVEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.secretLevel}),'%')
or t1.SCRAP_REASON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.scrapReason}),'%')
or t1.PRODUCT_RISK_ANALYSE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.productRiskAnalyse}),'%')
or t1.SCRAP_MONEY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.scrapMoney}),'%')
or t1.RECOVERY_STORE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.recoveryStore}),'%')
or t1.DEVICE_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceId}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.created_by_person , t1.created_by_dept , t1.created_by_tel , t1.form_state , t1.proc_name , t1.proc_id , t1.asset_id , t1.unified_id , t1.device_category , t1.device_name , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_dept , t1.user_id , t1.user_dept , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.created_date , t1.position_id , t1.original_value , t1.total_depreciation , t1.net_value , t1.net_salvage , t1.secret_level , t1.scrap_reason , t1.product_risk_analyse , t1.scrap_money , t1.recovery_store , t1.device_id from assets_device_scrap t1 where t1.id = #{id}

insert into assets_device_scrap( id, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date, last_update_ip, version, created_by_person, created_by_dept, created_by_tel, form_state, proc_name, proc_id, asset_id, unified_id, device_category, device_name, device_model, device_spec, owner_id, owner_dept, user_id, user_dept, manufacturer_id, created_date, position_id, original_value, total_depreciation, net_value, net_salvage, secret_level, scrap_reason, product_risk_analyse, scrap_money, recovery_store, device_id)
select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creationDate}, #{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastUpdateDate}, #{item.lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createdByPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdByDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdByTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.formState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.procName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.procId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unifiedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deviceCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deviceSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ownerDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.manufacturerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.originalValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.totalDepreciation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.netValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.netSalvage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.secretLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.scrapReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productRiskAnalyse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.scrapMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.recoveryStore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.update:
update assets_device_scrap
id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creation_date =#{creationDate},
last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate},
last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version =version+1,
created_by_person =#{createdByPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by_dept =#{createdByDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by_tel =#{createdByTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
form_state =#{formState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proc_name =#{procName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proc_id =#{procId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_id =#{assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unified_id =#{unifiedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_category =#{deviceCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_name =#{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_model =#{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_spec =#{deviceSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_id =#{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_dept =#{ownerDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id =#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_dept =#{userDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manufacturer_id =#{manufacturerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_date =#{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
position_id =#{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
original_value =#{originalValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_depreciation =#{totalDepreciation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
net_value =#{netValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
net_salvage =#{netSalvage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
secret_level =#{secretLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scrap_reason =#{scrapReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_risk_analyse =#{productRiskAnalyse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scrap_money =#{scrapMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
recovery_store =#{recoveryStore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_id =#{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id} and version =#{version}

update assets_device_scrap set id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_date =#{creationDate}, last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate}, last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version =version+1, created_by_person =#{createdByPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by_dept =#{createdByDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by_tel =#{createdByTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_state =#{formState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proc_name =#{procName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proc_id =#{procId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_id =#{assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unified_id =#{unifiedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_category =#{deviceCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_name =#{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_model =#{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_spec =#{deviceSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_id =#{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_dept =#{ownerDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id =#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_dept =#{userDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manufacturer_id =#{manufacturerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date =#{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, position_id =#{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original_value =#{originalValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_depreciation =#{totalDepreciation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, net_value =#{netValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, net_salvage =#{netSalvage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, secret_level =#{secretLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scrap_reason =#{scrapReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_risk_analyse =#{productRiskAnalyse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scrap_money =#{scrapMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recovery_store =#{recoveryStore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_id =#{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id} and version =#{version}

update.foreach: update assets_device_scrap set id =#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by =#{item.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_date =#{item.creationDate}, last_updated_by =#{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_date =#{item.lastUpdateDate}, last_update_ip =#{item.lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version =version+1, created_by_person =#{item.createdByPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by_dept =#{item.createdByDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by_tel =#{item.createdByTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_state =#{item.formState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proc_name =#{item.procName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proc_id =#{item.procId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_id =#{item.assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unified_id =#{item.unifiedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_category =#{item.deviceCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_name =#{item.deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_model =#{item.deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_spec =#{item.deviceSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_id =#{item.ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_dept =#{item.ownerDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id =#{item.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_dept =#{item.userDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manufacturer_id =#{item.manufacturerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date =#{item.createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, position_id =#{item.positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original_value =#{item.originalValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_depreciation =#{item.totalDepreciation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, net_value =#{item.netValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, net_salvage =#{item.netSalvage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, secret_level =#{item.secretLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scrap_reason =#{item.scrapReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_risk_analyse =#{item.productRiskAnalyse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scrap_money =#{item.scrapMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recovery_store =#{item.recoveryStore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_id =#{item.deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{item.id} and version =#{item.version};
